name: nfcii
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0

body.origin:
|- wnfc(s0, c0)
-| wnf(s0, wcel(cv(s1), c0))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wnfc(s0, c0)
-| wnf(s0, wcel(cv(s1), c0))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)

body.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wcel(cv(s1), c0))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wal(s0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnfc(s0, c0)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wal(s0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)))

comment: Deduce that a class ` A ` does not have ` x ` free in it. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2016.)
